Function reference

Adding data

These functions allow users to add information about samples being run to the database

add_agency()
Add Agency
add_assay()
Add Assay
add_enum_value()
Add Enumerated Type Value
add_genetic_identification()
Genetic Identification
add_genetic_method()
Add Genetic Method
add_laboratory()
Add Laboratory
add_plate_run()
Create Plate Run
add_protocol()
Add Protocol
add_raw_assay_results()
Add Raw Results
add_run_type()
Add Run Type
add_sample_bins()
Create sample bins
add_sample_events()
Create sample events
add_sample_location()
Add Sample Location
add_sample_plan()
Add Sample Plan
add_sample_type()
Add Sample Type
add_samples()
Add samples
add_status_code()
Add Status Code
protocol_template
Templates

Delete Protocol

Delete Run Type

Delete Sample Location
delete_sample_type()
Delete Sample Type
delete_status_code()
Delete Status Code

These functions allow users to retrieve information from the database

Retrieve Agencies

Retrieve Assays

Retrieve Sample Locations

Get Sample Status
get_sample_types()
Retrieve Sample Types

Get Samples
get_samples_needing_action()
Samples needing further genetic analysis
get_status_codes()
Retrieve Status Codes

These functions convert results into database-ready formats

process_plate_layout()
Process Plate Layout
process_raw_assay_results()
Process Raw Assay Results

Process Sherlock Results

Get Sample Details

Field sheet management

These functions relate to creating and processing field sheets

Create Field Sheets

Create Multiple Field Sheets

Helper functions

These functions are generally not used in standard workflow but are employed within functions.

excel_column_index
Excel Column Index
extract_previous_end_row()
Extract Previous End Row
extract_sherlock_protocol()
Extract Sherlock Protocol
generate_range()
Generate a cell range
generate_ranges()
Generate all cell ranges for tables containing assay results
generate_threshold()
Generate Thresholds
is_valid_sample_field_data()
Helper function - checks field sheet data format
is_valid_connection()
Check Database Connection is Valid
